translations.translation: Have taqwa of Him who created you and the earlier creatures.'
And fear Him who created you and all the earlier people."
and have fear of Him Who created you and the earlier generations."
Have fear of the One who has created you and the generations that lived before you."
“And fear Him Who created you and the earlier creations.”
And have Taqwa of Him Who created you and the generations of the men of old."
And guard against (the punishment of) Him who created you and the former nations.
Fear Him who created you, and the generations of the ancients.'
And keep your duty unto Him Who created you and the generations of the men of old.
Fear Him who created you and those who have gone before you."
So fear Him Who created you and the former generations.
Be wary of Him who created you and the earlier generations.’
And fear Him Who created you and (who created) the generations before (you)"
And fear Him Who created you and the generations of the men of old."
Fear He who created you, and the generations of the ancient'
And fear Him who created you and the masses of old.”
And fear He who created you and the former creation."
[26:184] And fear Him Who created you and the former generations’, [all] creation [before you].
(And keep your duty unto) and fear (Him Who created you and the generations of the men of old) He created the people of old before you.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَٱلْجِبِلَّةَ ٱلأَوَّلِينَ } معناه الخَلْقُ

translations.translation: And the meaning of the verse "And the mountains were the first creatures" is that the creation took place in mountains.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } كيف تفسدون فيها، وتظلمون من عليها { ٱتَّقُواْ } القادر المقتدر { ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكُمْ } وأظهركم من كتم العدم { وَ } كذا خق { ٱلْجِبِلَّةَ ٱلأَوَّلِينَ } [الشعراء: 184] وذوي الخلقة من المتقدمين من أسلافكم وغيرهم أيضاً
